unit.creator: Philodemus || Verhasselt, Gertjan
unit.title: History of the Eleatic and the Atomistic Schools || Fr. 5a PHerc. 327 || Diplomatic Apparatus

dsl.content: 1 ][ sub lineam vert. 2 ⌈τ⌉ N:  dext. sup. horiz. P: [O] ⌈ν⌉ N: [ (ν, μ) P ⌉[ sin. inf. arcus vel vert. 3 ⌈λ⌉ ON:  (λ, α) P ⌉π sup. arcus P: ε ON ⌈ο⌉ N:  sin. med. arcus P: ι O ⌉⌈ (λ, α, δ) ⌈ν⌉ N: [PO] ⌉δ̣ (ϲ, ε, η) ⌈ι⌉ N: [PO] 4 init. suppos. litt. unius α⌈ arcus vel vert. cum sup. desc., inf. vert. ⌈νοι⌉ O: ] arcus, vert.: ν[ N ⌉ sin. arcus 5 π̣[]λ̣ε̣ι P: τωιπ O: τωιτ N: fort. ωιπ/ωιτ apographorum erant litt. superpos. 6 εφ sup. horiz., (α, λ) 7 ]α dext. vert. ⌈η⌉ O: ][ (η, ν, ιϲ) P: ιϲ N ⌉α (ν, η, π) 8 ⌈ε⌉ O: [PN] τ̣α dext. med. vest., vert. 9 ]ε inf. vest. ⌈τ⌉ N:  inf. vert. P: ] (τ, π) O fin. ] vert. 10 post ν̣[ suppos. 2 litt. ]ν̣ε[][ inf. vert. sub lineam, inf. vest., inf. asc.: ]ν[]ροϲ[ O 11 ]ρ̣ sup. horiz. εδ̣κ sup. vert, vert. vel arcus, (α, λ), inf. vest., sin. inf. asc.
